Improvements.Improvement: Use Java 8 forEach instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Description: Java 8 introduced the forEach method for Collections class. It is more readable and efficient. It eliminates the usage of index variable.

Improvements.Improvement: Avoid code duplication by creating a method
Improvements.Description: The code inside the loop for 'executors' and 'reactiveExecutors' are almost the same. It's good to avoid code duplication by creating a method that handles the logic
